LightningComponentBundle.description: A component that displays various types of alerts (success, error, warning, info) with icons, messages, and close buttons.

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Success Message
property.description: The message to display in the success alert

property.name: errorMessage
property.label: Error Message
property.description: The message to display in the error alert
property.default: Error! There was a problem with your request.

property.name: warningMessage
property.label: Warning Message
property.description: The message to display in the warning alert

property.name: infoMessage
property.label: Info Message
property.description: The message to display in the info alert
property.default: Information: This is an informational message.

property.name: showSuccess
property.label: Show Success Alert
property.description: Controls whether the success alert is displayed

property.name: showError
property.label: Show Error Alert
property.description: Controls whether the error alert is displayed

property.name: showWarning
property.label: Show Warning Alert
property.description: Controls whether the warning alert is displayed

property.name: showInfo
property.label: Show Info Alert
property.description: Controls whether the info alert is displayed
